name: CONFIGURE_COMPONENT_TOOL_NAME
description: You call this tool if you need to get the available options for a property of a component. The property description will tell you if you can use this tool and what the parameter values are.

name: QUERY_TOOL_NAME
description: What API or integration are you trying to use? What problem are you trying to solve? You can tell me multiple parts at the same time and I will return a list of apps that can solve your problem.

name: SELECT_APPS_TOOL_NAME
description: Select the apps you want to use
